import React, { useState } from 'react' const Chat = (socket, username, room) => { const [message, setMessage] = useState('') const sendMessage = async() => { const messageCOntent = { username: username, message: message, room: room, date: (new Date(Date.now)).getHours()+ ':' + (new Date(Date.now)).getMinutes() } await socket.emit('message', message) setMessage('') } return (

setMessage(e.target.value)} className='w-3/4 h-12 border p-3 outline-none' type="text" placeholder='message send'/>
) } export default Chat
